basics.name: Maria Thiloba
basics.summary: A fun loving, enthusiastic and confident, young female driving instructor who's passionate about driving and loves cars. Would like to make the experience stress free for the new learners and help them become safe drivers with confidence to drive without help.

training.area: Certificate IV in Transport and Logistics (Road Transport - Car Driving Instruction)

volunteer.summary: Volunteered at the coffee stall for the Maytime fair, talking with customers and liaising with the barista.
highlights: Enjoyed talking and interacting with customers.
Handled high customer volumes and sales which was a high pressure job.

volunteer.summary: Volunteered for various events held at school and other locations where I had to interact with Children.
highlights: Interacted with children in various age groups building my confidence in dealing with youth.

education.institution: Pearl Academy Of Fashion, Chennai, India
education.area: Post Diploma in Apparel Merchandising & Production
Diploma in Fashion designing & Garment Construction

references1.name: Erlich Bachman
references1.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.
